title: Worlds Master pass?
body: I purchased the master pass on my main account (too lazy to switch accounts atm) and it said I would get get a gemstone out of it but I didn't? Help aaa

replies.body: Just as Lew said, you may not actually get a specific popup just for that gemstone. I'd be more than happy to double check your main account to make sure it was added for you, but I do need the Summoner Name/Region of the account you want me to check!

Sorry been a while since I logged in to check this. But I would be grateful if you were able to check!

Account name: Hi Its Cryion
Region: NA
You don't get a pop up, the gemstone just gets added automatically to your loot inventory so you should see it there.
